title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, a professional makeup painting kit designed for both kids and adults. This palette is perfect for Halloween, FX looks, parties, and artists alike. 

The palette contains 20 vibrant colors in both flash and Aqua types, including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white. The plastic case is sturdy and convenient, making it easy to carry and store. 

Applying the paint is a breeze with either a sponge or brush, and the oil-based, non-toxic formula is gentle on the skin. The paint is easy to blend, comfortable to wear, and dries quickly, ensuring a smudge-proof and durable finish. Minimal rub-off means your design will stay intact throughout the day. 

When it's time to remove the paint, simply use olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover. 

With the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, you can unleash your creativity and achieve a variety of artistic and special effects looks. It's perfect for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween. You can create looks like a crown, costume, bruise, blood, or even cosplay characters. 

Don't miss out on this high-quality, color-saturated palette that is easy to use and safe for your skin. Get your UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette today and let your imagination run wild.
